resources.string: BMW Vision Next 100 \n\n This car incorporates something called Alive Geometry which allows the car to turn in different directions.

Audi R8 V10 Plus \n\n Sharing roughly 50% of the same parts as the R8 GT3 LMS race car, the Audi R8 Coupe is bred through the lens of motorsport. The 562-hp or 602-hp V10 performance engine epitomizes the mid-engine drivetrain concept, providing ideal vehicle balance through its center of gravity and dynamic weight transfer characteristics.
Land Rover Range Rover \n\n Currently the Land Rover Range Rover has a score of 7.6 out of 10 which is based on our evaluation of 38 pieces of research and data elements using various sources.
